name: Corruption: Arrival
description:
Please enjoy this brief demo of what will become my first release;

Corruption: Arrival

A single player, turn based RPG.

Explore various maps for relics and treasure while under the employ of the Wizard Guild. Defeat other guilds to gain control of the mysterious areas under the effects of what has come to be called the Corruption.

What is the source of this negative energy? Where did it come from? Find out as you delve into deeper and more challenging areas.

Comments, Feedback and Criticism are welcome and very much appreciated!

ProjectFO Games

I am a 1 person (for now) Indie Game Dev Studio from Ontario, Canada.

My long term goal is to be the first AAA Developer that adopts the 'pay what you can' business model. All of ProjectFO Games' content will be available at no charge; with no ads or in app purchases either.
